structure.unit: ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES -- PROHIBITIONS, RESTRICTIONS, AND REGULATIONS

law.catch_line: Persons whom licensees may not employ -- Partial exception.

text.section: The provisions of paragraphs (a) and (b) of subsection (1) of this section shall not apply if the employee's duties do not involve the sale, service, delivery, or traffic in alcoholic beverages at the licensed premises.
Violation of this section shall subject both employer and employee to penalties provided in this chapter and shall be cause for revocation of license.
